text:
I have installed apache/2.2.3 version and loaded mod_jk-1.2.31-httpd-2.2.x.so into the server. However i am getting the below error when i am trying to debug.

httpd: Syntax error on line 201 of /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf: Cannot load /etc/httpd/modules/mod_jk-1.2.31-httpd-2.2.x.so into server: /etc/httpd/modules/mod_jk-1.2.31-httpd-2.2.x.so: wrong ELF class: ELFCLASS32
creator: sunil_mudili@infosys.com
rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
mod_jk is being developped as part of the Tomcat project.
So please post your question to the Tomcat users list.
Details on how to subscribe to that list are available at
http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html

Regards,

Rainer
